alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 11:17AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...SNOW AND LOW VISIBILITY, ALONG WITH MIXED PRECIPITATION... A band of precipitation will continue moving east across northeast South Dakota and west central Minnesota into early afternoon. Initially, the precipitation will be moderate snow, creating very low visibility at times when combined with the strong winds gusting over 40 mph. The precipitation may mix with sleet and light freezing rain at times, creating slick roadways. Warm air will follow this band of precipitation, with temperatures rising above freezing. Expect hazardous travel conditions at times into the early afternoon hours, before quick improvements are noted from west to east.
